MarkDown support

Testing chunks
This test comes after the chunk is declared, but before it is inserted. <#Include Label="MyChunk">
The text "Hello, world." is inserted right before this.
Testing code chunks
This test comes after the code chunk is declared, but before it is inserted. <#Include Label="MyCode">
The text "Hello, world." is inserted right before this.
